data.event: It was renamed Ava in 1881, the town's original name having been "Militia Springs."
The area was settled during the 1830s and Douglas County was incorporated in 1857 with Vera Cruz as county seat.

event.title: 1864 the town of Militia Springs was founded

data.event: In 1864 the town of Militia Springs was founded and became the new county seat in 1870.

event.title: became the new county seat in 1870

data.event: In 1864 the town of Militia Springs was founded and became the new county seat in 1870.
The town was platted in 1871 and renamed Ava in 1881 although not incorporated until 1908.
